text: Tomadera madhye ki ke'u asa kare ye tara khejura o angurera bagana hoka, yara nice diye baye cale jharanaraji, athaca tara santanara durbala, ematabasthaya take pakaralo ghurnijhare, yate rayeche agunera halaka, phale ta pure gela! E'ibhabe allah tomadera jan'ya tamra banisamuha suspasta kare thakena yena tomara cinta karate para.
